item.description:
Hey! Let's have a brunch :)

It's been awhile, so let's get outside and brave the not so cold weather and meet some friendly faces!

Zocalo is right on comm ave in Brighton and surprisingly spacious inside. I've had their dinners before and it was pretty good.
Let's meet around 12:30 outside the main entrance, and we can probably head in when the majority of the people are there.

It's on B-Line at Warren T stop, and street parkings are available on comm ave (hit or miss, watch out for the resident only signs)

Brunch Menu
http://messinamarketi...

Zocalo
http://www.zocalobrig...

Yelp
http://www.yelp.com/b...
item.name: Brunch at Zocalo Cocina Mexicana
